casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael E. LEWIS. No. 322P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of June 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
